properties.name: SSID
properties.description: The service set identifier (SSID) of the current 802.11 network.

properties.name: BSSID
properties.description: The basic service set identifier (BSSID) of the current access point.

properties.name: linkSpeed
properties.description: The current link speed in Mbps

properties.name: networkID
properties.description: Each configured network has a unique small integer ID, used to identify the network when performing operations on the supplicant.
